item.title: Chapter I: Christmas / The Burning Church
item.description: Chapter I # Christmas / The Burning Church # Winter 1905. In his home village, Aizpute, close to the Baltic Sea. # [To be published]

item.title: Prologue
item.description: Prologue # The Disappearance of Kristaps Keidann # Autumn 1915. 2nd Latvian Riflemen Regiment, 24 miles from Riga. # The day dawned clear and serene. The sun was bright as amber, the sky blue as young maidensâ€™ eyes and the top of trees swayed with the sound of distant German artillery. If not for this occasional, low tum of German howitzers, localized around 12 miles south, the forest would be in complete silent.
